description: Regshot is an open-source (LGPL) registry compare utility that allows you to quickly take a snapshot of your registry and then compare it with a second one - done after doing system changes or install
summary:
Regshot is a small, free and open-source registry compare utility that allows you to quickly
take a snapshot of your registry and then compare it with a second one - done after doing
system changes
author: maddes, regshot, xhmikosr
